content: I couldn't agree more! the resurgence of the manufacturing industry in detroit is a testament to the city's resilience and commitment to innovation. it's also a great example of how a community can work together to support economic development and bring jobs back to the community. by investing in the manufacturing industry, detroit has the potential to create new jobs, boost the local economy, and improve the quality of life for residents. a strong and thriving manufacturing industry also contributes to the broader economy, and it's good to see detroit playing a role in this.
